name: Dreadnought Clash at Sea
description:
Battle against other players in realtime PVP or against the AI in PVE naval battles.

- Build your fleets from 8 ship classes ranging from Dreadnoughts to PT boats.
- Earn Prestige to improve your ships' armor, weapons, weapon range, speed, acceleration and a miscellaneous skill based on the ship class..
- Lay and sweep mines.
-Win by destroying the enemy fleet, or getting your Troop Transport, Battleship or Dreadnought into the enemy harbor.
-Let Game Center create a match for you, or invite a friend to play.

Note: This game is meant to be multi-player, but currently we do not have enough players to ensure PVP is available. I highly recommend you get a friend or family member to download the game as well in order to play PVP via GameCenter. PVE mode (vs AI) is really meant to be a practice mode only.
